lines.text: It's gonna be nice to get away from all these weirdos.

[a little brassily, during her first tryst with Jerry]
So, would you like to peel a tomato?

[quieter, more seductively]
Do you want to strip me?
Apis mellifica - that's short for "bee", right?

[looking at the people assembled in the dorm's common area]
Boy, you sure get the cream of the CRAP here on weekends.

[seeing Pookie naked for the first time]
Gee, Pookie, your body's just... beautiful.
Yeah? Well, I'd better get my beautiful ass into this beautiful bed, before it freezes off!
Some people guzzle God like He was a keg of beer.

[privately debunking his ladies-man reputation to Jerry]
I'll bet you and me are the only two guys in the dorm who've never been laid.
